name: Cauli flower pickle
description: Cauli flower pickle is a tangy and spicy condiment made from Indian gooseberries. It is prepared by marinating amla pieces in a mixture of spices and letting it mature for a few days. It adds zesty flavor to Indian meals.

name: Avakaya pickle
description: Avakaya pickle is a popular South Indian pickle made from raw mangoes. It is prepared by mixing diced mangoes with a blend of spices like mustard seeds, red chili powder, fenugreek, and salt. The mixture is then left to ferment for a few days to develop its unique tangy and spicy flavors. Avakaya pickle is known for its bold taste and is a delightful accompaniment to rice, roti, or any South Indian meal.

name: Dell Series
description: The Laptop is compact with its 6.2-inch OLED screen and far lighter at 168g. It perfectly captures the design, looks, and feel of the expensive one. It comes with a snapdragon processor with a 5n chip in it. It has a 200mp camera in the rear 100mp in front perfect for selfie lovers. It also support HDR content means you can watch 4K content on it.
